record.description: Harper Court. [Reproductive print copy of a drawing of] Haskell Hall (right), the main building of the Graduate School of Business. Business East (left) was turned over to the Business School in October 1959 when the Law School [moved] its new quarters. The second floor of the East Building is being remodeled to accommodate the business and economics collection now in Harper Library.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
